title: Quantitative statements
description: Extract quantitative statements from a text

entity_1.description: Short name of the first entity to be compared (typically one or two words, do not include the trait name)

entity_2.description: Short name of the second entity to be compared (typically one or two words, do not include the trait name)

trait.description: The trait/characteristic being compared between the two entities (one word)

operator.description: Operator used to compare the trait between the two entities (`approx` and `equal` may ONLY be used with `quantity` of 1.0, otherwise use one of the other operators)

quantity.description: Quantity of the operator as a float with 1.0 being the reference value (use `0.0` if no meaningful quantity can be found)
